laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Serum 25-(OH)-D was normalized within 3 weeks after oral substitution with vitamin D (5000 IU/d) and calcium (1000 mg/d).

laboratory_examinations.findings: 1, 25-dihydroxycholecalciferol, parathyroid hormone, calcium, phosphate were normal.
Severe generalized osteopenia, deformities and marginal erosions of the metatarsal/metacarpal bones and phalanges, and big cystic lesions of both tibiae.
Demonstrated generalized osteopathia with pseudofractures of the ribs.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Magnetic resonance imaging of the skull
